mod.name: The Immortal
mod.description:
Reach for the moon, Immortal Smoke!
This Mod adds Fujiwara no Mokou [藤原 妹紅] from Touhou to Slay the Spire.

Want to translate this?
Reach out to me!

cards.name: Defend+

cards.name: Searing Shot

Apply 1 Vulnerable.

apply 2 Weak.

cards.name: Meltdown+

cards.name: Phoenix's Feathers+

cards.name: Explosive Flame

cards.name: Extinguish
cards.description:

cards.name: Extinguish+
cards.description:
Purge your Exhaust pile.
If [diffAddS] *66% [diffAddE] of your master [diffAddS] your [diffAddE] deck was purged, kill all enemies and gain a random rare relic.

cards.name: Spontaneous Human Combustion+

cards.name: Ventilation

cards.name: Ventilation+

relics.name: Phoenix Feather
relics.description: Instead of losing all Vigor, lose 75% instead.
relics.flavorText: A fiery-red feather shed from a phoenix.Its feathers are patterned like a flame.
